itemDisplayName: VM-RedHat - JBoss EAP 7.2 cluster on RHEL 8.0 VM
description: This template allows you to create a RHEL 8.0 VM running JBoss EAP 7.2 cluster and also deploy a web application called eap-session-replication, you can login into the admin console using the Eap username and password configured at the time of the deployment.
summary: This template deploys a web application called eap-session-replication on JBoss EAP 7.2 cluster running on RHEL 8.0 VM
